responses: Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting
The event check-in starts at 5 pm. For more details, please visit the official website to check out the detailed schedule.

patterns: What do you mean by hackathon?
responses: A hackathon is best described as an invention marathon. Anyone who has an interest in technology attends a hackathon to learn, build & share their creations for a weekend in a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere. You don’t have to be a programmer and you certainly don’t have to be majoring in Computer Science.

patterns: I don't know how to code
What if i don’t know how to code?
I don’t have any coding experience
What if i don’t know how to code?
responses: Not a problem! It’s entirely irrelevant what your experience is going into a hackathon. You should have a basic idea of algorithms and you are good to go. There are many tracks in our hackathon which would require less coding, you can opt for it.

patterns: What should be the size of the team?
Do I need to form a team?
responses: It is possible to register individually but for participating in the hack you need to form a team of 2-6 members. Do not worry many team building opportunities would be provided.
Tracks are Fintech, IOT, security, human safety

patterns: What should be the size of the team?
Do I need to form a team
responses: It is possible to register individually but for participating in the hack you need to form a team of 2-6 members. Do not worry many team building opportunities would be provided.
Absolutely! There will be prizes. Check the website prize section for details.

patterns: What if my team is not able to complete it in the given time?
responses: Just because you create a product does not mean you have to submit it. Take the hackathon as an opportunity to get debugging help from the various sponsors that are there and work with a team that is just as interested in your project as you.

patterns: What will be the judging criteria
responses: The judging criteria will be revealed soon. Yes, you have the opportunity to select a track and submit a project idea accordingly.

patterns: Who is on the judging panel?
responses: The judging panel will be announced soon..
